title: SEC says part of the Ripple ruling was ‘wrongly decided,’ hints at filing appeal
description:
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) said that a portion of the Ripple ruling was “wrongly decided,” according to documents filed in court on July 21. The part of the ruling referred to — the part that went against the SEC — stated that the sale of XRP on exchanges did not constitute a […]

The post SEC says part of the Ripple ruling was ‘wrongly decided,’ hints at filing appeal appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Charting Bitcoin’s Predictable Course: A Comprehensive Review of the Next 29 Reward Halvings
description: In under 280 days, Bitcoin’s blockchain will undergo its fourth reward halving event, slicing the block subsidy from 6.25 BTC to 3.125 BTC. title: Arbitrum Price Prediction 2023 – 2032: Can ARB Reach $100?
description: Arbitrum Price Prediction 2023 – 2032 As the world anticipates improvements, a third alternative has emerged: scaling solutions.
